SEARCH
Package com.app.service

Interface QuestService

All Known Implementing Classes:
QuestServiceImpl
public interface QuestService
Interface for managing quests in the application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    QuestData
    addQuest(QuestData questData)
    Adds a new quest to the system.
    int
    calculatePoints(AnswersDto answersDto)
    Calculates the total points based on the provided answers.
    QuestData
    findQuest(Long questID)
    Finds a quest by its ID.
    List<QuestData>
    generateRandomsQuests()
    Generates a list of random quests for gameplay.
    QuestData
    removeQuest(Long questID)
    Removes a quest from the system based on its ID.

  • Method Details

    • addQuest

      QuestData addQuest(QuestData questData)
      Adds a new quest to the system.
      Parameters:
      questData - the data of the quest to be added
      Returns:
      the added QuestData object with its generated ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if questData is null

    • generateRandomsQuests

      List<QuestData> generateRandomsQuests()
      Generates a list of random quests for gameplay.
      Returns:
      a list of randomly selected QuestData objects

    • calculatePoints

      int calculatePoints(AnswersDto answersDto)
      Calculates the total points based on the provided answers.
      Parameters:
      answersDto - the answers submitted by the player
      Returns:
      the total points calculated from the answers
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if answersDto is null

    • removeQuest

      QuestData removeQuest(Long questID)
      Removes a quest from the system based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      questID - the ID of the quest to be removed
      Returns:
      the removed QuestData object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if questID is null or if no quest is found with the given ID

    • findQuest

      QuestData findQuest(Long questID)
      Finds a quest by its ID.
      Parameters:
      questID - the ID of the quest to be found
      Returns:
      the QuestData object corresponding to the given ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if questID is null or if no quest is found with the given ID
